info.name: Userstyles.org ― No Stylish for Android!
info.description: This style will simply remove all of the Android contents. No more pesky Stylish for Android pop-ups and options anywhere! Not even when you login! ― Version: 3 (October 23, 2019) | View change logs

style.css:
@-moz-document regexp("https?://(www\\.)?userstyles\\.org/(?!users).*")
{
  .overlay_background, 
.overlay_container,
.close_overlay_button,
.overlay_flex_div, 
.overlay_image, 
.fallbackDiv, 
img.fallbackImg, 
div.us-stylecard--short:nth-child(3), 
div.us-stylecard--short:nth-child(5), 
div.us-stylecard--short:nth-child(12), 
.walking, 
#top_android_button, 
div.us-stylecard--long:nth-child(3), 
div.us-stylecard--long:nth-child(5), 
div.us-stylecard--long:nth-child(12), 
.android_button_button, 
.android_button_banner, 
.choose_editor div.box:nth-child(2),
.navigation a[href*="/categories/android"]
  {
    display: none !important;
  }
}

@-moz-document domain("userstyles.org") {
.overlay_background, 
.overlay_container,
.close_overlay_button,
.overlay_flex_div, 
.overlay_image, 
.fallbackDiv, 
img.fallbackImg, 
.walking, 
#top_android_button, 
.android_button_button, 
.android_button_banner, 
.choose_editor div.box:nth-child(2)
  {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
